findings.rationale: Obligations that continue indefinitely can lead to unmanageable liability and compliance risks, as the parties may be held accountable for disclosures long after the relationship has ended.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnification without limit can expose a party to significant and unforeseen liabilities, particularly if a breach occurs.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The absence of liability limitations can result in substantial financial exposure for either party, as they may be liable for all damages incurred.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The unilateral ownership of all work products by one party may discourage collaboration and create disputes over contributions and rights.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: Provision for recovering attorneys' fees may deter parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to the financial burden of potential legal costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
